```{r 1, include=TRUE}

n1 <- 100 #random
p2 <- NULL
n2 <- NULL
p0 <- 0.75 #random


proptest <- prop.test(x = c(p1, p2), n = c(p1, p2), p = p0, alternative = c("two.sided"), conf.level = 0.95, correct = TRUE)
  if (n1*p1 <= 5 || n1*(1-p1) <= 5){
```

```{r 2, include=TRUE}
data <- read.csv("KamilarAndCooperData.csv")
data
model_longevity <- lm(data = data, MaxLongevity_m ~ Brain_Size_Species_Mean)
model_longevity
library(ggplot2)
```

